Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still-smoldering NDP headquarters. Mike Pence announcement expected today, not tomorrow POLITICO has learned: Rep. Mike Pence is expected to announce late Thursday whether he is running for president, POLITICO has learned. The announcement will appear first in the Indianapolis Star, an aide said. Mike Pence has been deliberating over his political future, stepping down from House Republican leadership as he mulls whether to run for president
